#summary Collection class API
#labels API

=Class Object=
*Package:* js.util<br/>
*File:* [http://code.google.com/p/jsool/source/browse/trunk/jsool/js/util/Collection.js Collection.js]<br/>
*Extends:* [JsCoreObject js.core.Object]<br/>
----
Defines methods to control groups of Object ( or elemements) inside a collection;
===Public Methods===
|| *Name* || *Parameters* || *Description* ||
||add||Object object||A object to be stored on the collection||
||addAll||Array/Collection collection||A group of elements to be added on the collection||
||contains||Object object||Checks if _object_ is econtained inside of the collection||
||isEmpty||_void_||Returns `true` if there's no element on the collection||
||size||_void_||Returns the amount of elements on the collection||
||iterator||_void_||Returns an object to helps iterating with the collection||
||remove||Number index||Removes the element on the _index_||
||toArray||_void_||Returns an Array with all the elements on the colection||
